SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.annotations
Annotation Type Action

@Target(value=METHOD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Action

This annotation marks method as action method. Both default and non default actions must annotated to be processed by the controller.

Created on: 2011-10-02 14:26:59

Author:
Wojciech Niemiec

Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String name
          Name of this action.
 Serialize[] response
          Gets information about non default response serialization.
 

name

public abstract java.lang.String name
Name of this action. Names should fallow normal methods naming conventions, e.g., should start with small letter, contain only alphanumeric characters, etc. If custom name is not specified, action method name is used. There cannot be multiple action classes with the same name.

Returns:
action name.
Default:
""

response

public abstract Serialize[] response
Gets information about non default response serialization.

Returns:
non default serialization information.
Default:
{}
